name: Fourbis Monthly Email Report for WooCommerce
author: 4BIS Innovations B.V

sections.description:
Get a monthly report with your sales from you woocommerce store. It only shows completed orders. It also gives you an admin section
where you can customize your tables and enter the email adresses you want to sent the report to. You get 3 tables

  • the first is a table with your sales overvies and has the following headers

    • total orders placed
    • total amount sold(without shipping costs)
    • total products sold.

  • the second is a table with your sold products overview and has the following headers

    • product name
    • quantity
    • price excluding VAT
    • VAT

  • the third is table with a list of all products sold and their order # and it has a list of options you can enable or disable in the admin panel

    • order id
    • date
    • name customer
    • price a piece excl VAT
    • VAT a piece
    • VAT total
    • email customer
    • country
    • phonenumber
    • quantity

Every one of these options you can turn off or on depending on what you want/need in you report.
sections.changelog:
= 1.02 | 03-06-20
* fixed bug so that ajax.php doesnt get the css

= 1.01 | 21-04-20
* fixed call to file locations
* fixed generic function names

= 1.0 | 20-04-20
* initial commit

short_description: Get a monthly report of your sales in your WooCommmerce store.
